metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20316 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the way Samba handled file/directory metadata. This flaw allows an authenticated attacker with permissions to read or modify share metadata, to perform this operation outside of the share.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per upstream, fixing this required a whole rewrite of the VFS layer and there is no reasonable way to fix this in older versions. Marking this CVE as ignored for older releases.

criterions.comment: samba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
